resources.string:
The purpose of this app is to help users avoid distractions on their phone. Many of us have distractions such as notifications, Social Media Platforms, messages and many other things. This app hopes to address those issues by preventing the user for accessing apps and notifications.


Set up:


1) On the setup page, tap create at the bottom of the screen.

 2) Enter in the requested information and tap create and apply.

 3) That is it! Your settings will be applied to your phone.


Verify that your setting is active on the Mode screen and you are good to go!
Distract me not created by Emily, Tyler, Evan and George \n @2018
Thank you for downloading our app! Before you get started we need access to your notifications to prevent those dastardly distractions!
You must enter a name for your mode
